message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it offers significant value, but I'm open to discussing the price if you have any thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $120?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  Could you meet me halfway at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we aim for $125?
